trans-unit.target: Proiezioni e trasformazioni (LINQ to XML) (Visual Basic) | Documenti di Microsoft

trans-unit.source: Projections and Transformations (LINQ to XML) (Visual Basic)
trans-unit.target: Proiezioni e trasformazioni (LINQ to XML) (Visual Basic)

trans-unit.source: This section provides examples of [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/sqltecxlinq_md.md)] projections and transformations.
trans-unit.target: In questa sezione vengono forniti esempi di [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/sqltecxlinq_md.md)] proiezioni e trasformazioni.

trans-unit.source: In This Section
trans-unit.target: Contenuto della sezione

trans-unit.source: Topic
trans-unit.target: Argomento

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Descrizione

trans-unit.source: [How to: Work with Dictionaries Using LINQ to XML (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/how-to-work-with-dictionaries-using-linq-to-xml.md)
trans-unit.target: [Procedura: utilizzare dizionari in LINQ to XML (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/how-to-work-with-dictionaries-using-linq-to-xml.md)

trans-unit.source: Shows how to transform dictionaries to XML, and how to transform XML into dictionaries.
trans-unit.target: Viene illustrato come trasformare dizionari in codice XML e viceversa.

trans-unit.source: [How to: Transform the Shape of an XML Tree (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/how-to-transform-the-shape-of-an-xml-tree.md)
trans-unit.target: [Procedura: trasformare la forma di una struttura ad albero XML (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/how-to-transform-the-shape-of-an-xml-tree.md)

trans-unit.source: Shows how to transform the shape of an XML document.
trans-unit.target: Viene illustrato come trasformare la forma di un documento XML.

trans-unit.source: [How to: Control the Type of a Projection (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/how-to-control-the-type-of-a-projection.md)
trans-unit.target: [Procedura: controllare il tipo di proiezione (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/how-to-control-the-type-of-a-projection.md)

trans-unit.source: Shows how to control the type of a [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/sqltecxlinq_md.md)] query.
trans-unit.target: Viene illustrato come controllare il tipo di una query [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/sqltecxlinq_md.md)].

trans-unit.source: [How to: Project a New Type (LINQ to XML) (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/how-to-project-a-new-type-linq-to-xml.md)
trans-unit.target: [Procedura: proiettare un nuovo tipo (LINQ to XML) (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/how-to-project-a-new-type-linq-to-xml.md)

trans-unit.source: Shows how to project a collection of a user-defined type from a [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/sqltecxlinq_md.md)] query.
trans-unit.target: Viene illustrato come proiettare una raccolta di tipo definito dall'utente da una query [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/sqltecxlinq_md.md)].

trans-unit.source: [How to: Project an Object Graph (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/how-to-project-an-object-graph.md)
trans-unit.target: [Procedura: proiettare un oggetto grafico (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/how-to-project-an-object-graph.md)

trans-unit.source: Shows how to project a more complex object graph from a [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/sqltecxlinq_md.md)] query.
trans-unit.target: Viene illustrato come proiettare un oggetto grafico più complesso da una query [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/sqltecxlinq_md.md)].

trans-unit.source: [How to: Project an Anonymous Type (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/how-to-project-an-anonymous-type.md)
trans-unit.target: [Procedura: proiettare un tipo anonimo (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/how-to-project-an-anonymous-type.md)

trans-unit.source: Shows how to project a collection of anonymous objects from a [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/sqltecxlinq_md.md)] query.
trans-unit.target: Viene illustrato come proiettare una raccolta di oggetti anonimi da una query [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/sqltecxlinq_md.md)].

trans-unit.source: [How to: Generate Text Files from XML (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/how-to-generate-text-files-from-xml.md)
trans-unit.target: [Procedura: generare file di testo da XML (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/how-to-generate-text-files-from-xml.md)

trans-unit.source: Shows how to transform an XML file to a non-XML text file.
trans-unit.target: Viene illustrato come trasformare un file XML in un file di testo non XML.

trans-unit.source: [How to: Generate XML from CSV Files (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/how-to-generate-xml-from-csv-files.md)
trans-unit.target: [Procedura: generare XML da file CSV (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/how-to-generate-xml-from-csv-files.md)

trans-unit.source: Shows how to use [!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](../../../../csharp/includes/vbteclinq_md.md)] to parse a CSV file and generate XML from it.
trans-unit.target: Viene spiegato come usare [!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](../../../../csharp/includes/vbteclinq_md.md)] per analizzare un file CSV e generare codice XML da esso.

trans-unit.source: See Also
trans-unit.target: Vedere anche

trans-unit.target: [Esecuzione di query su strutture ad albero XML (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/querying-xml-trees.md)
